sentences.sContent: Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.
sentences.sCn: 严禁种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentences.sContent: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.sCn: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.sContent: toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes
sentences.sCn: 不强化性别模式化观念的玩具

sentences.sContent: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.sCn: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

phrases.pCn: 性别认同；性别认定；性（别）身份
性別平等；男女平等；两性公平

trans.tranOther: the fact of being male or female

trans.tranCn: 生（过去式gendered，过去分词gendered，现在分词gendering，第三人称单数genders，形容词genderless）
